archimate:Requirement.name: Correlate asset criticality, vulnerability severity and threat actor activity
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
require a way to discover what commercial products are used to deliver services
As a Security Resources in TEMA, ISO 27k and vulnerability management process require a way to discover what commercial products are used to deliver services. If tool is "built in house", the 3rd party components included in the service are exposed to the internet. This needs to be combined with information about new vulnerabilities and exploits so that I can find most critical assets to mitigate and take corrective actions since internet facing assets are most exposed to threats.
CIS Control 7: "In selecting which vulnerabilities to fix, or patches to apply, an enterprise should augment NISTs Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) with data concerning the likelihood of a threat actor using a vulnerability, or potential impact of an exploit to the enterprise. "
